0829.title: REDACTED
0829.desc: Today's JPOD picture contained someone's face, so I've removed the picture for their privacy. Sorry for any disappointment this may have caused.

0910.title: Grabbing at Mice
0910.desc: Jasper is laying underneath a chair on his back. One of his hands is in front of his face as he swipes at a toy just above the frame.

0911.title: After a Hard Day's Play
0911.desc: After only a few minutes of playing and running around, Jasper is already tired out! Here he is laying on a rug, his favorite toy just out of reach.
